text:
@narendramodi Sir, we need a discipline nation in this situation. No one can escape from COVID-19 avoiding self restrictions & self Care.
We need to stay home more and more to save our country unless the Virus is finished .

We trust on our government..
Thanks a lot to Modi Sir.
